DOC.brief_summary: This study design compare TRV130 placebo morphine learn effect pain relief side effect .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics TRV130 , Morphine , Placebo Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: This study explore pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics ( PD ) , safety tolerability TRV130 .
DOC.criteria: Informed consent Healthy adult male age 18 50 year , BMI 1932 kg/m2 Acceptable duration cold pain test result screen Clinically significant medical illness physical exam finding Active dermatological condition skin trauma nondominant hand , peripheral vascular disease Partial blindness , keratoconus , nystagmus ophthalmic condition could interfere pupillometry Use tobacco nicotine within 6 month prior screen History recent ( within 6 month ) drug alcohol abuse , define DSMIVTR
DOC.keyword: acute pain , analgesia , respiratory drive , ventilator response hypercapnia , pupillometry
